thread.title: VIDEO: All Of The Fights, Rioting, Property Damage, And Flash Bangs From President Trump’s Inauguration
thread.title_full: VIDEO: All Of The Fights, Rioting, Property Damage, And Flash Bangs From President Trump’s Inauguration

author: paulsacca
title: VIDEO: All Of The Fights, Rioting, Property Damage, And Flash Bangs From President Trump’s Inauguration
text:
Protesters smash windows of Bank of America, police moving in pic.twitter.com/lJZDQSwagB 
— Zoe Tillman (@ZoeTillman) January 20, 2017 

DisruptJ20, anti-capitalist black bloc groups, anti-Trump protesters, and other anarchists attempted to bring the ruckus in Washington D.C. in an attempt to disrupt President Donald J. Trump’s inauguration on Friday. While most protesters were peaceful (especially considering how many hundreds of thousands of people with polar opposite views were crammed in one place), there were many rioters that used all means necessary to cause chaos. 
The black bloc was out in full force earlier in DC! #DisruptJ20 #TrumpInauguration #AntiFa pic.twitter.com/N9FM3d6F91 
— Ash J (@AshAgony) January 20, 2017 

They smashed out windows to a limo.
Protesters just smashed the windows of this limo, threw in a flare pic.twitter.com/KMeXIbzBHH 
— Zoe Tillman (@ZoeTillman) January 20, 2017 

They smashed out windows to a Starbucks and a Bank of America. 
Protesters smashed windows of a Starbucks and Bank of America in Washington, DC, during Pres. Trump's inauguration https://t.co/1y4sqXWCep pic.twitter.com/iupe72TeNt 
— CNN (@CNN) January 20, 2017 
Meanwhile, at Starbucks… (video by @stranahan ) #Inauguration pic.twitter.com/n8YYdkv3sC 
— Breitbart News (@BreitbartNews) January 20, 2017 


People inside Starbucks at the anarchist smashed the window of pic.twitter.com/IRuwEZ0TuE 
— Lee Stranahan (@stranahan) January 20, 2017 
A riot is breaking out. They smashed Bank of America and Starbucks #Inauguration pic.twitter.com/ycIcOslZQt 
— Cassandra Fairbanks (@CassandraRules) January 20, 2017 

They even busted up am Au Bon Pain. No croissants for capitalists. 
Protesters knocked out windows of Au Bon Pain. #inauguration2017 #Inaugurationday pic.twitter.com/CXnmhdzuvG 
— Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) January 20, 2017 

In other words, window fitters are gonna make a killing this week. 
They not only knocked down two newspaper dispensers. 
They are knocking over newsstands. #inauguration2017 #Inaugurationday pic.twitter.com/RaJY45fNIB 
— Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) January 20, 2017 

But THREE newspaper dispensers. 
Edgy. #inauguration2017 #Inaugurationday @politico pic.twitter.com/9oLUREVMXt 
— Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) January 20, 2017 

Watch out for these guys.

And nothing hammers home your agenda quite like vandalizing the board of education building. 
Graffiti on the board of education building. #inauguration2017 #Inaugurationday pic.twitter.com/RbOY8OKeHJ 
— Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) January 20, 2017 

They don’t even respect Pokemon-themed STD advertisements at bus stops. 
Apparently, the Trump protesters oppose STD testing. #inauguration2017 #Inaugurationday pic.twitter.com/AvurMKxE6O 
— Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) January 20, 2017 

The situation deteriorated into a literal garbage fire. 
Happening in front of The Washington Post. pic.twitter.com/cyH6m7YwWD 
— Steven Ginsberg (@stevenjay) January 20, 2017 
Trump supporter puts the fire out at 13&K out so a protester grabs his hat and then they scuffle #Inauguration pic.twitter.com/UMDGrWfNjw 
— Ryan Lovelace (@LovelaceRyanD) January 20, 2017 

You would think that anti-capitalists would embrace an incoming President who is so often linked to Russia. 
Fights broke out between Bikers for Trump and protesters.
Fistfight breaks out between Bikers for Trump and #DisruptJ20 protesters near barricaded #inauguration checkpoint. pic.twitter.com/IHLI7cyXy6 
— Ryan Lovelace (@LovelaceRyanD) January 20, 2017 
Bikers For Trump guy fights with #DisruptJ20 protester pic.twitter.com/JVUpuDBsQZ 
— Alexander Rubinstein (@AlexR_DC) January 20, 2017 


Police countered by pepper spraying rioters and flash bangs.
BREAKING NEWS: tear gas being used at an anti-Trump protest in Washington DC pic.twitter.com/kQm0BdciBc 
— Trashvis (@Trashvis) January 20, 2017 
D.C. Cops spraying tear gas & concussion grenades at #AntiFa protesters now! #disruptj20 #acab pic.twitter.com/jZZzXeMQU7 
— Ash J (@AshAgony) January 20, 2017 

Protesters and police played hot potato with concussion grenades. 
NEW: Riot police throw flash bangs at protesters on Washington, D.C.'s K Street, @errolbarnett reports https://t.co/AsjUerEVmy pic.twitter.com/KmswRFKIRZ 
— CBS News (@CBSNews) January 20, 2017 

Protesters also blocked I-395. 
Anti-Trump protesters have blocked the I-395. pic.twitter.com/abFZdYVEHm 
— Breaking911 (@Breaking911) January 20, 2017 


The protesters blocked many checkpoints even for these men wearing Air Force uniforms. 
#disruptj20 protesters blocking men in Air Force uniforms from getting through the #Inauguration checkpoint pic.twitter.com/XVErOHHBwg 
— Ryan Lovelace (@LovelaceRyanD) January 20, 2017 

Even PETA got out there to protest the inauguration for some reason. 
People in @peta costumes walking through protesters and Bikers outside the #Inauguration now pic.twitter.com/w2tLkFRlhX 
— Ryan Lovelace (@LovelaceRyanD) January 20, 2017 

Then there was this gentleman who took the inauguration especially hard. 
An anti-Trump protester screams 'no' as Donald Trump is sworn in as the 45th US President pic.twitter.com/qmsaFmMSkr 
— ITV News (@itvnews) January 20, 2017
